dialogues.text: This is Shaolin Wu Shu. Continue. Drew sits in the dirt, watching everyone around him sail air and flip over the ground. He is not a happy camper.

dialogues.speaker: TRAINING AREA.
dialogues.text: The entire group is gathered in a sort of pit, on a hard floor. D.S. stands in the middle. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to go over some takedowns before we end for the day. I'll need a partner... He scans the group, and then points to Drew. Drew smiles walks to the front and bows to D.S. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch carefully as I take him down, using techniques from shwai jyau, Chinese wrestling. DREW (looking at ground)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, Master, but there aren't any mats here. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do they always use mats in America? The group laughs a little at that, and Drew's manhood is challenged. D.S. (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you are scared, I'll get someone else. Perhaps Gao would assist me...

dialogues.speaker: GAO
dialogues.text: Who is already getting up, ready and willing. This changes Drew's mind right away. ANGLE ON DREW AND D.S. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do it. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attack me straight on... Drew attacks, and is taken down brutally, smashed into th concrete floor. No attempt is made to cushion or soften t Drew gets up right away, and attacks again. Again he is d ground. This continues from all angles and all methods of

dialogues.speaker: THE GROUP
dialogues.text: Who can barely watch the destruction.

dialogues.speaker: THE FIGHT
dialogues.text: The D.S. does not let up at all, taking Drew down hard each time. Every time, regardless of the i gets right back up. His eyes are dazed, there is a little coming out of his nose, but he keeps coming back for more Finally, after a high arcing back throw, a real thumper, all of them, the D.S. calls it a day. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any questions? Good, that's all for today. Before anyone can move, however, Drew raises his hand as can, obviously in pain. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sure I got that last throw clear in my mind. The group gasps, knowing how much Drew must be hurting, a for his guts. Even Gao is impressed. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said that's enough. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're getting too old for this kind of training, I understand. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attack! Drew attacks, and the D.S. executes the manuever perfectl Drew down almost on his head. Luckily, Drew is able to tw last moment and take the impact on his already bruised sh moans and groans and lies there. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I've got it now. Xie Xie! The group disburses, shaking their heads in wonder. Li co Drew, who is still lying on the ground. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you trying to kill yourself? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hurts more than me, he's just not bleeding, that's all. He tries to get up, but moans in pain and falls back down Li helps him up and takes him to the showers. ANGLE ON D.S. Watching them go. There is a slight smile on his face.

dialogues.speaker: TIGER BALM.
dialogues.text: It is huge, and looks really painful. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you go to San De, he can send you to a doctor... Drew pulls away and stands up. He backs up to the wall of dormitory, right underneath a window. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I appreciate your concern, Li, but it's not that serious. I'm all right. Just as he is talking, Gao comes to the window with a pan water (from washing the floor of the dorm).

dialogues.speaker: GAO LOOKS DOWN, (GAO POV)
dialogues.text: Hhe smiles, then pours the huge bucket over the edge, dou

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As the dirty water hits him, drenching him.

dialogues.speaker: WATERFALL.
dialogues.text: It is huge, and the water is crashing down from high abov

dialogues.speaker: A MONK, INSIDE THE WATERFALL
dialogues.text: He is going through martial arts techniques as the water onto him.

dialogues.speaker: D.S. AND GROUP
dialogues.text: As they stand on the bank. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Concentrate on your stance. All I want you to do is try to hold your stance. Li, you're first. Li smiles and walks into the waterfall, using a walkway t behind the thundering water. He moves into the water a little, and gets into a deep ho He stand there, immovable. After a moment, he turns to lo ANGLE ON D.S. Who motions him farther into the water.

dialogues.speaker: LI
dialogues.text: Who nods his head and walks into the thundering water. As gets into the main stream of water, he is forced off the falls about 20 feet into the pool below. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Next... Each of them try it in turn. Everyone fails. Gao goes in, and he manages to stand under the impact of for a moment, before he too succumbs and goes down into t

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: It's his turn. He walks to the waterfall and goes in. He umbrella he stashed behind the waterfall (imprinted with GIANTS NFL" logo on it В­ unmistakably American). He walks into the waterfall, and the umbrella works for a Drew is holding it with both hands, and he gets into a de stance. He turns to smile at the D.S., and then waves at the othe as he takes a hand off the handle of the umbrella, the wa him and off he goes into the pool. He lands with a huge splash, doing a painful bellow flop. to the surface, still clutching the now- destroyed umbrel smiles at the other disciples, who are still swimming, sh DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought I'd join you guys.

dialogues.speaker: GROUPS WORKING OUT.
dialogues.text: Drew is in with the group. Gao and Drew are chosen to do exercise together. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In this exercise, you try to touch your partner's chest lightly, and your partner tries to block. The group gets started doing the drill, and Gao is almost Drew's chest in with his blows. He is so close to Drew th doesn't have a chance to block it. On the last strike, Dr back to the ground. The D.S. is there immediately. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something wrong? Drew shakes his head and gets back up. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switch! Now it's Drew's turn to strike, and he tries to hit Gao w amount of force as he did, but Gao avoids his attack, thr off balance. He throws another punch out, and Gao grabs i Drew falls to the floor again. A monk who was watching wa MONK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The goal of this drill is not to hurt your partner. Just try to tap his chest. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, but... MONK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then do it that way... The Monk walks away, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: PLAYING CATCH WITH A FRISBEE.
dialogues.text: Drew is flipping it in a bunch of different ways, and Li watching him. To the side of the courtyard are two brooms leaning again DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This sure beats sweeping...

dialogues.speaker: FRISBEE
dialogues.text: Floating past temple statues and ancient Chinese decorati missing them. Drew makes an acrobatic catch and then flicks it back to than he should have. It heads for an ancient statue and s dead center, right in the face. The statue starts to tip! Drew and Li rush for the statue and catch it, just before over and smashes on the ground. They look at each other, thanking their lucky stars the s fall. They start to throw the frisbee again, when Drew sp coming towards them. Drew stashes the frisbee in his shirt and grabs the broom He tosses one to Li and they just begin sweeping again wh rounds the corner. The D.S. knows something is going on, but they look so in D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweep the main chamber, Drew. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, master. He bows and smiles goodbye to Li. He walks into the main chamber.

dialogues.speaker: DREW WALKING INTO THE CHAMBER.
dialogues.text: This is the chamber where they had their first workout, a stands there for a moment, soaking up the tradition of it He walks to an area of the chamber under the famous paint stands staring at it. QUICK CUTS to different ANGLES of the painting.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who begins to sweep. His broom is going over the depressions where the monks t soon he loses his desire to sweep. He takes the broom in a weapon and starts to spin it, going through a martial a his feet moving naturally into the depressions in the flo He finishes with a flourish, having moved into a shadowy corner, and then bows to an imaginary crowd, using the br microphone. DREW (imitating an announcer)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Presenting, the greatest fighter in the history of the Shaolin temple... Drew Carson! Drew holds his broom over his head, nodding his head to t crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd is going wild. Just then, out of the shadows comes an attacking staff, S Drew's unprotected stomach! Drew, ready to double over in pain, hears the staff hit t and stands up straight, adjusting the frisbee that saved Before he can react, the staff SMACKS him in the back of sends him pitching to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he lands face down in the pile of dust and dirt he alr up.

dialogues.speaker: DISTANCE.
dialogues.text: Drew is standing in front of a painting-statue of Bodhidh which he is made to look extremely fierce. San De walks up behind Drew and stands there for a moment

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was an amazing monk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, what's up with him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come with me... San De walks away, and Drew follows him.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE BREWING TEA.
dialogues.text: The room is filled with paintings and scrolls. A Golden S a place of honor. San De    puts the tea    leaves into the pot, then soaks water.    He pours the    water out, then repeats the pro times.    His movements    are all very precise and caref looks    like a martial    art kata. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Legend states that Bodhidharma gave us tea. Once, while meditating, Bodhidharma fell asleep, a natural reaction we all have to fight against. San De looks pointedly at Drew, who doesn't meet his eyes

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: When he awoke, he was so enraged at his eyelids for betraying him, he tore them off and threw them to the ground. (beat) From those eyelids grew the first tea bush. You see, even the leaves look like eyelids. San De shows Drew a tea leaf. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impossible. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing is impossible if your spirit is pure, and your will is strong. The tea is ready, and San De begins to pour for Drew. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I understand you've been questioning some of the teachings of the temple... DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just not the way I was taught... San De keeps pouring into Drew's cup. It is getting to th De is not stopping. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master! Stop! No more will go in! San De continues pouring until the tea runs all over the SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly! You are like this cup, full of what you have learned. How can we show you Shaolin unless you first empty your cup? He picks up the cup and tosses the tea through an open wi pours into the empty cup. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rules and disciplines of the temple exist to free you, not restrict you. They keep your mind from harmful thoughts. (beat) Drink your tea. Drew nods and sips at his tea.

dialogues.speaker: SHAOLIN WU SHU.
dialogues.text: His body moves with the wind, bending and swaying. Anothe attacking him with a hard style, and the soft style is ve effective. Drew and Li try it, and Drew is having a lot of trouble. to training hard style, and the soft style seems too weak D.S. comes over. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not fighting В­ I feel like I'm dancing or something... This soft stuff is unnatural В­ Fighting should be hard, tough... The D.S. holds out his hand, in a tight fist. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If my hand was always like this, what would you call it? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a beat) Deformed. He opens his hand, letting it go limp. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And if it was always like this? DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Again, deformed. The D.S. nods and walks off, leaving Drew to stare questi Li.

dialogues.speaker: COLLECTED.
dialogues.text: They are not dressed in their monastic robes, however. Th street clothes. It is their day off! A monk comes down the line, handing out hats to the disci put them on, and wait for instructions from the D.S. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, let no one know you are disciples at the Shaolin Temple, but do not forget that you are. Dzai Jyan. They file out.

dialogues.speaker: THE DISCIPLES EXITING THE TEMPLE.
dialogues.text: As soon as they are out, the serious faces break into smi they are teenagers again. Some of the disciples run off t relatives waiting for them in the courtyard, while a grou stick together. Drew is walking with Li, Wu and several others.

dialogues.speaker: THE GROUP
dialogues.text: As they walk through the small town outside of the temple They pass by Ashema's stand, but only the Bau Bau is ther Drew bows to the Bau Bau, then slips off his hat, rubbing head for Bau Bau to see. Bau Bau laughs, and the rest of rush up to Drew, forcing his hat back on his head. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drew! We're not supposed to... DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chill out, guys! It's our day off! He bows to Bau Bau and then they walk off. They walk through the small town, checking it out. They walk through the countryside, enjoying their freedom Drew has brought a frisbee with him, and they are tossing

dialogues.speaker: FAMOUS LUO YANG CAVES.
dialogues.text: The hills are filled with Buddhist carvings.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he walks by the carvings. The detail and the artistry

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND GROUP
dialogues.text: As they walk by a riverside park. The park is filled with a group of kids swinging into the river on a rope. Drew s watch them, then looks back at the others. They all shake their heads. Drew nods his. They continue to shake their heads. Drew starts running towards the kids, stripping off his s same time. The others pause for a moment, then follow his

dialogues.speaker: GROUP
dialogues.text: As they swing into the river, trying to keep their hats o splash into the water. they are having the time of their

dialogues.speaker: GROUP
dialogues.text: Resting on the bank of the river. Drew and the guys spot girls down the bank from them. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check it out, guys! WU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girls! DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good work, Wu. What tipped you off? LI (alarmed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are not allowed to have contact with females. It is the most serious rule of the temple. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a stupid rule, Li. But... He is about to turn away, then spots Ashema as she runs d to the group of girls. He stands up immediately and start her. He is jogging, at the same time trying to straighten and his hat. Li starts running after Drew. The others follow. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: ASHEMA
dialogues.text: Who hears her name. She looks around, sees Drew but doesn immediately recognize him. She looks around the park. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ASHEMA! Here! She looks at Drew again, and this time recognizes him. Dr and impulsively he gives her a hug, genuinely very happy Li arrives and pulls them apart. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!?! LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can get kicked out of the temple for this... DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's going to tell, Li? You? He turns to Ashema, who has now backed off a little bit a looking at Drew, a smile on her face, but is pretending t embarrassed. The other girls are gathered around, gigglin DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing at girls) Not the giggle girls again! How've you been? You look great! ASHEMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hiding a laugh) You look... funny. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. ASHEMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you like the temple? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh... nobody's supposed to know. Li tugs at Drew's shirt. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We really shouldn't be doing this... DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying to show you guys a good time. (to Ashema) I guess I gotta go. It was great to see you. One of the giggle girls behind Ashema whispers something She nods and smiles. ASHEMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My school is having a party this Tuesday night. Can you and your friends come? Li and the guys immediately hem and haw their negative re Drew smiles and takes Ashema's hand. The girls start to g He brings her hand up to his lips, and kisses it gently. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll be there.

dialogues.speaker: REST OF THE DISCIPLES GATHERED AROUND.
dialogues.text: The room is dark В­ it's after lights out. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you nuts? We can't go to a party, with GIRLS! DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? We're working hard, we deserve some R & R. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'R & R'? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've earned this. Back home in New York, you don't say no to a party... Where's your sense of adventure? WU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you do at a 'party' with girls? Drew smiles, knowing that he has them. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dance, and talk. And have a good time. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That clinches it, we can't dance. WU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we don't know how to talk to girls... DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (trying to sound like an expert) That's easy. You just talk to them like you would to the guys В­ you just don't tell them as much, and... not in the same way... Drew is in over his head. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like you know? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, dancing's easy. I'll show you. We'll start with slow dancing. An OOOH escapes from the guys. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dirty dancing! Giggles now. Drew pulls his boom box out of his backpack, searching for a suitable tape. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys grab a pillow for a partner, while I find some slow music. The disciples have grabbed their pillows. Drew pops the c his boom box and turns it on, low and sultry. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just move in time to the music, nothing elaborate. Think of it as a soft form... The disciples move and sway in time to the music. They ar their pillows like imaginary girls.

dialogues.speaker: LI
dialogues.text: Who is holding his pillow at arm's length.

dialogues.speaker: DREW WALKS BY LI
dialogues.text: DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loosen up, Li. She's not going to bite! LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know?

dialogues.speaker: WU
dialogues.text: Who is really getting into it. He is dancing with his pil cheek, and occasionally sneaking a kiss.

dialogues.speaker: OTHER MONKS
dialogues.text: Practicing their dancing and preparing for the party.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who sits back on his bed, his hands clasped behind his he DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is going to be great...

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: Still moving and swaying to the music.

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: Now asleep and in bed, still clutching their pillows like girls.

dialogues.speaker: DOOR
dialogues.text: As it opens. The D.S. looks in on the room, and sees all holding their pillows. He shakes his head and then closes

dialogues.speaker: TWO BODIES FIGHTING, KICKING AND PUN
dialogues.text: CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL Drew and Gao going at it. The disciples are paired off as well, but the only real actio this ring. Drew is getting tagged, hard, while the points he scores relatively controlled. After one particularly powerful sh stops. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought this was light contact! GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fight, you coward! Drew stares at Gao, then looks around for the D.S. He is other side of the training area. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got it. Before he can move, however, Gao attacks, slamming him fu the face. Drew almost falls to the ground, then attacks h battle is joined. The fighting is fast and furious, and soon the others see happening, and gather around. One of the monks comes over to break it up, but they continue fighting, wrestling, ki punching. The D.S. finally gets over to them, and without moving a barks В­ D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! Drew and Gao immediately break apart, breathing heavy and daggers at each other. D.S. (to others)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back to work. He turns and walks off, motioning for Drew and Gao to fol Drew follows immediately, with Gao behind him. Gao shoves

dialogues.speaker: ROOM.
dialogues.text: San De is sitting down reading a Buddhist text. With a si it down. On the wall behind is hanging a Golden Sash. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So soon? (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me what happened. Drew looks at Gao, and Gao looks at Drew. There is a paus is very uncomfortable. Finally, Drew speaks. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was my fault. I started it.

dialogues.speaker: GAO
dialogues.text: Surprised at Drew's confession. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Disciple Gao was better than me. Drew pauses, and Gao is even more surprised at the revela DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lost my temper. He was only defending himself.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Who nods his head and looks at Drew. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this true, Disciple Gao? Gao looks at Drew, wondering what he should say. Drew loo nodding for him to say yes. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. But, I am not completely blameless... SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't think you were... (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shaolin martial tradition is built on challenges. We challenge ourselves, but we do not fight with each other. Never do we fight to see who is best В­ we train to be able to right wrongs, not to let our hands and feet express emotions run wild. A Shaolin never throws a punch or kick in anger. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shake hands and let your emotions go. Gao looks at Drew, knowing that the anger is already long away in the shock of Drew taking the blame. They shake hands. Both Drew and Gao notice the Golden Sash hanging on the w occupying a place of honor. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is the Golden Sash, the highest honor of the temple. It is awarded to the monk who has attained the pinnacle of understanding. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The best fighter? SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Among other things. Fighting is only a small part of being a Shaolin monk. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yours? San De nods. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Return to your training. Drew and Gao get up, bow to San De and head for the door. They get to the door at the same time, however, and for a jockey for position, trying to be the first one through t Finally, Drew tires of the game and opens the door for Ga DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten more seconds and I would have kicked your ass... Gao smiles and walks through the door. Just as he passes punches him in the stomach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In your dreams...

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES GETTING READY TO GO OUT.
dialogues.text: They are dressed in "street" clothes and are just pulling hats. Drew, instead of wearing his temple-issue hat, pull York Yankees baseball cap!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, we're ready! He leads them towards the window of their dorm, but stops gets there. He turns to where Gao is standing, all alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gao, you coming or what? There is a moment of indecision, then Gao frowns, shakes comes jogging towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm coming, just to keep you out of trouble!

dialogues.speaker: EMPTY COURTYARD BATHED IN MOONLIGHT.
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a figure lands on the ground with a PUFF of dus In a crouch, Drew scans the area, then motions for the ot down. Immediately, other figures land with PUFFs of dust all ar soon as they have all landed, they move off.

dialogues.speaker: GROUP
dialogues.text: As they    sneak    through the courtyards and training a temple.    They    are about halfway across from the fron temple    when a    monk comes walking towards them. He i bobbing    В­ he    looks drunk. Drew shoots Li and Gao a questioning look. Drunk? In the They take refuge behind a couple of the columns and watch makes his way past, weaving and throwing kicks and punche tense moment as the monk comes uncomfortably close to whe Gao are standing, but he walks on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whisper) Drunken Kung Fu... Drew nods and leads them out of the temple.

dialogues.speaker: FRONT OF GIRL'S SCHOOL.
dialogues.text: It is the same school where Drew first met Ashema. The gu happy, arrive at the school, and the realization of what about to do sinks in. They stop talking and are staring at the building. Drew s the door, and nobody follows his lead. He stops and motio to join him. Nobody moves. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we men or are we sheep? A beat, then the entire group bellows: GROUP

dialogues.speaker: SHEEP
dialogues.text: And they follow Drew, the shepherd, in through the front noises like sheep.

dialogues.speaker: PARTY.
dialogues.text: It isn't happening. The boys are on one side, the girls a other. The music is bad Chinese rock and roll. The only ones together are Drew and Ashema, who are talki center of the room. The disciples are all clustered toget at the walls and the ceiling. A group of giggle girls are around Drew and Ashema. A group of toughs are standing at one side of the party r observing everything that's going on.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND ASHEMA
dialogues.text: DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great party... Ashema smiles a sheepish smile. Drew decides that if they to have a good time, he's going to have a hand in it. He cassette tape, gives it to Ashema DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Play this when I signal, OK? She nods and walks off. Drew motions for Gao and the guys over. They do, and when they do, Drew turns to the giggle DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ladies, allow me to introduce my best friends in all of China... He drags Gao over to one of the prettier girls. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Gao. And this wild man is Li... Drew does the same for Li, Wu, Su, Sou and all the others them to stand with the girls for a moment. When everyone off, he motions to Ashema. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit it! INSERT of Ashema's finger on the tape player "PLAY" butto

dialogues.speaker: THE ROOM
dialogues.text: As the song the disciples have been singing in the fields Immediately, the disciples start moving with the music, a the Party is happening.

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: Who are now slow dancing to a romantic melody В­ some hol girls closer than others. Drew and Ashema are locked in a their eyes closed. A hand comes in and taps Drew on the shoulder. DREW (eyes still closed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now, Li... The hand comes in again, punching Drew in the shoulder ha Drew opens his eyes, and sees that he is surrounded by fi guys, dressed in dark clothes and with sunglasses on. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can I do for you? TOUGH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave. ANGLE ON DISCIPLES. They have noticed what is going on.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, thanks. He turns back to Ashema, but she is pulled back by the gi away from danger. The tough spins Drew around and pushes him HARD. One of t has already gotten behind him, on his knees, and Drew goe over the tough, landing hard on the ground, the wind knoc him. Drew gets up, wincing, not really ready to fight. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't we talk this over? The tough pulls his fist back to strike Drew, who has bee two other toughs, his arms pinned behind his back. Suddenly, a figure FLIES in and SLAMS the tough to the gr It is Gao, and he immediately sets on the other toughs. T ERUPTS in a melee as the disciples go at it with the vill The girls are SCREAMING as the boys kick and punch. The disciples are winning, having a great time, until the room SLAMS open and the HEADMISTRESS comes storming in, s the top of her lungs for them to stop.

dialogues.speaker: DREW, GAO AND THE DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: As they all agree as one to hightail out of there. They g past the Headmistress and out the door, full speed.

dialogues.speaker: THE DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: As they climb back into the dorm room.

dialogues.speaker: IS DREW.
dialogues.text: He lands on the hardwood floor, panting his lungs out aft After a BEAT, he lifts his head and looks right at Gao. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you say you were going to keep us OUT of trouble? The group pauses for a BEAT, then they all laugh, relaxin

dialogues.speaker: SIGNS OF WARNING.
dialogues.text: Gao sits down and looks around. They are all dressed in t training clothes, dirtied after a full day of training. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe nobody's said anything! It's been a whole day! LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We broke every major rule the temple has, how could we get away with it? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think we might have. If they knew, they'd have already gotten us! You guys just have to stop looking so guilty.

dialogues.speaker: WU
dialogues.text: Who pushes his dinner away from him. WU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've lost my appetite. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go back to the dorm for a few minutes, go over our stories in case they seperate us... He gets up to leave, and the others follow him. LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seperate us?

dialogues.speaker: IN THE COURTYARD ARE SEVERAL POLICEMEN, WAITING AROUND.
dialogues.text: Drew and the others spot the cops, and walk quickly to th room.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND THE OTHERS ARE FRANTIC.
dialogues.text: DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cops! Somebody called the cops?!? Before anyone can answer, the door opens and the D.S. wal room, his face serious. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drew! Come with me to San De's chamber... He turns to go, but the others are on their feet, ready t Drew. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just Drew. Drew looks at them and shrugs, then follows the D.S.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE AND THE GIRLS SCHOOL HEADMIST
dialogues.text: Also in the room are two high-ranking police officials. T Headmistress is yelling at the top of her lungs, and San sitting there, letting her vent. She has obviously been g for some time, because her face is sweaty and flushed. Sh Drew and the D.S. enter and points an accusing finger at HEADMISTRESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's the one! SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drew, I think you know Headmistress Low. Correct? Drew can only nod. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The police have also come. A morals violation is what brought them... Drew's head snaps up at the words "morals charge" POLICE LIEUTENANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We demand that he leaves the temple, and China! POLICE CAPTAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's a disgrace, to the temple and to this country. He must leave. They all agree that Drew should leave, and for a moment t the three of them agreeing fills the room (ad libs).

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who is staring down into the abyss. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a serious issue, there is no question. This we will have to take under advisement В­ but we will handle matters of this temple. POLICE CAPTAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This involves more than just the temple. I am authorized to escort him from your temple to the jail now, tonight, where he will be held until he leaves the country. San De pauses, letting this sink in. The D.S. steps forwa D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, may I? (San De nods) We accepted a challenge when this disciple came into our ranks. If we force him to leave China, we admit failure. Can we do that? The police don't have an easy answer to that.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who is surprised that the d.s. is sticking up for him. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are wise. You know what is right and what is not right. This disciple does not even know right from wrong. Who will teach him if we do not? This sinks in, and the police have nothing to say. The He will not keep quiet, however. HEADMISTRESS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He does not belong here! DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whisper) Chill out, honey! Drew catches a hard look from the D.S. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would you be so hard hearted as to turn him away from that which he so desperately needs? She is about to speak, but thinks better of it. San De stands up, signalling that the meeting is over. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you all for coming. I am pleased that you brought this problem to our attention. May you sleep well tonight knowing that the situation has been swiftly resolved. POLICE CAPTAIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do not wish to visit you again with this kind of news. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will not have to. The Headmistress starts to say something, but San De hold hand, stopping her. He leads them out, then closes the do back to face Drew. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, I can't tell you how sorry I am. I appreciate you both going to bat like that for me. I won't let it happen again. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neither will we. You must leave the temple in the morning. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I thought... the police... D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do not deserve to leave the country as a criminal, but you cannot stay. Drew sits for a moment, looking back and forth between Sa D.S. His eyes are filling with tears, and he wipes at the DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Master. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As am I. Drew gets up and walks out of the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: DREW WITH THE OTHER GUYS AROUND HIM.
dialogues.text: He has just finished telling the disciples what is going They are shocked. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why only you? Drew shrugs and goes over to his bed, lying down with a s LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The D.S. always told us that we're all responsible for what happens. WU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not fair. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't have to be fair...

dialogues.speaker: DREW LYING IN THE DARK
dialogues.text: Everyone else is asleep, but not Drew. He is staring at t

dialogues.speaker: DREW WAKING UP TO AN EMPTY ROOM.
dialogues.text: Everyone is gone already, their beds made up. Drew gets u and gathers up his few things. He puts on his New York Yankees cap and shoulders his back pack, then looks room one last time. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate long goodbyes anyway... He exits the room.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Walking through the courtyard, for the last time. Only a are around, and they don't meet Drew's eyes. The sounds of training can be heard O.S. Drew stops to li those sounds for a moment, then heads for the door.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he leaves the temple. He pauses for a moment with the then shuts it sadly. He looks out over the courtyard, whi completely deserted. Drew sighs, hitches his backpack ont and starts out. As he comes out of the doorway and into the courtyard pro sees...

dialogues.speaker: THE ENTIRE CLASS OF DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: Dressed in street clothes with their bags packed. Li and the front, their bags in their hands, smiling. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're either with us or against us, remember? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling) I'm with you! A cheer goes up from the entire group as Drew, Li and Gao the b.g. can be seen the D.S., who is observing all this.

dialogues.speaker: OF THE CHAIRS.
dialogues.text: The door opens and Drew walks in, the D.S. can be seen in San De indicates one of the chairs for him to sit in. He SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quite a show of solidarity, yes? Drew nods, trying to hide a smile. He is trying his best humble. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did you come to the Shaolin Temple? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (caught off guard) To train, Master. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yet you rebel at every rule, and blame the training for your inability to learn and progress? No response from Drew, who is just looking down at the gr SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are like someone swimming in fresh water crying "I thirst!". What you seek is all around you. Don't fight with the ways of the temple, the battle is within yourself. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Within myself? SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must accept the responsibility for your life. If we force you out of the temple, you can always blame the temple for your failure В­ it never has to be your fault. (beat) Life without committment is no life at all. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if I can't handle it? What if I fail? SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Live for the moment, Drew. The future will take care of itself. If you go through your days here, squeezing every last bit of life out of every minute, you need not fear failure. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a beat) Then, it's up to me. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Your fellow disciples stood up for you. It's your turn. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to let them down. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let yourself down. He bows to San De and then leaves the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: DREW COMES OUT, FINDING GAO AND LI WAITING FOR HIM.
dialogues.text: GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you staying? Drew waits for a moment, studying their hopeful faces. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm staying. If only to keep you guys out of trouble! They walk off, and just as they round a corner, a BANG is one of the monks drops the heavy wooden lid of a storage Drew jumps, spinning around in the direction of the sound LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drew! Are you allright? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm just a little on edge, that's all. Ever since I got to the temple, some nut has been attacking me with a stick В­ at night, in the toilet... anywhere! It's drivin me crazy... Gao and Li look at each other, nodding. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Honest, it's happening! I... GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every class of disciples, the one with the most potential is singled out for special training. We were wondering who it was... now, we know. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Special training? You mean...? Gao and Li nod, and Drew walks with them, shaking his hea

dialogues.speaker: WATER RUSH BY.
dialogues.text: In the b.g. comes Drew, dressed in his monastic robes, no head. He is making no attempt to hide the fact that he is Drew walks up to Ashema and takes her hand, and they stan for a moment. She then turns to him, and starts to say so Drew stops her with a finger on her lips, then strokes he DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ashema, beautiful Ashema, I can't see you anymore. I will... miss you and remember you... always. Ashema closes her eyes against the tears there, and burie against Drew's shoulder. ASHEMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are they making you do this? She wants to hear that they are, even if it's not true. S hear it. Drew pulls her head away from his shoulder, looking into would be so easy not to take the blame for hurting her li DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. It is my choice, and my responsibility. I'm sorry... He embraces her for the last time, and she openly begins holds her for a moment, then breaks the embrace and with long look at Ashema, walks away.

dialogues.speaker: DEVICE.
dialogues.text: The D.S. in the b.g. comes up and corrects his technique, immediately does it his way.

dialogues.speaker: DREW WORKING ON THE POLES.
dialogues.text: He is doing well, jumping from pole to pole, kicking    a tries an especially difficult sequence of moves, and    f THUMP to the ground. Immediately, he is back up and    on He tries the same set of moves, falls again. Instead    o Drew just laughs at himself, then climbs back up on    th

dialogues.speaker: BARE CHESTED DREW, SOAKED IN SWEAT.
dialogues.text: In the b.g. is a huge bronze buddha. Drew is in the same the Buddha.

dialogues.speaker: POINTED BARRELS.
dialogues.text: He fills them up, and then starts moving back towards the arms up and strong.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he goes through a thicket of bamboo. as he gets to the is attacked! The staff comes out, but Drew manages to blo one of the buckets. The staff strikes again, and Drew blo third time, and Drew raises both buckets over his head to and drenches himself with the water. Then, the staff hits stomach. His attacker has vanished, leaving Drew alternately moani pain, and chuckling at himself in the bamboo.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND LI
dialogues.text: As they go through a very intricate, beautifully staged s techniques. The last technique is a very powerful kick, a Drew is to block using the blocking technique he refused before. This time, the kick is thrown and Drew blocks it with the technique, sending Li pitching to the ground is a cloud o Drew turns around and high-fives Gao.

dialogues.speaker: SOFT GONG FU MOVES.
dialogues.text: Drew is next in line, and he moves through the techniques mistake. When he gets to the end of the routine, he break little dance step, having fun. The entire group breaks up laughter.

dialogues.speaker: D.S.' ARM
dialogues.text: Gao's hands are around his elbow, pulling down. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using your muscles, bend my arm. Gao pulls down, while the D.S. tries to fight back with h but finally, after great strain, his arm bends. A cheer g the group. D.S. smiles and motions for an old monk standing near him place. the old man puts his arm up on Gao's shoulder, and deep breath. He does not tense up his arm and shoulder. Gao looks questioning at the D.S. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if I hurt him? D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will not. Gao starts to pull down, gently at first, but when he see old monk's arm is not bending, stronger, until finally he all his strength into it. The old monk's arm has not move expression of relaxation and piece has not changed. Gao quits, not able to bend the arm. D.S. motions for Dre the other side of the monk. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grab his arms and try to pull him out of his stance. Drew and Gao shrug at each other and take an arm. They pu straining and groaning, but there is no movement from the It is like he is a heavy stone. They give up, and the D.S. bows to the old monk. D.S. (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Shu's spirit is indeed strong.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND GAO
dialogues.text: Sweating from their efforts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drew is on the ground, trying to do a kip. He is coming u is crashing back down onto his spine. The D.S. comes up t points at his chest. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try to hit me here with your feet. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With pleasure. Drew tries another kip, pushing his feet towards the D.S. lands on his feet easily, surprised.

dialogues.speaker: DREW CARRYING THE DIRTY PLATES FROM
dialogues.text: He carries them out to the garbage area, and begins to sc off. From out of nowhere comes the staff, swinging for Dr Drew doesn't jump, but just calmly avoids it. The staff W his head. Drew stands up, and the staff comes again, from direction. Drew avoids, and the staff finds empty air aga Drew goes on with cleaning the plates, a slight smile on After a BEAT, he looks around, trying to find the attacke is sure no one is around, he smiles bigger. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allright! I did it! As soon as he finishes saying that, the staff comes out a in the stomach, sending Drew to his knees in pain.

dialogues.speaker: THE DISCIPLES THROWING FLYING KICKS.
dialogues.text: The sequences are very beautiful as the monks throw kicks air and into targets.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND LI FIGHTING.
dialogues.text: Drew is rushing Li, throwing every possible technique at he blocks. Li gets into a low stance as he goes back, and this opportunity В­ he uses Li's own leg as a step and ju it, hitting him HARD with a jump spin hook. Li gets up right away and slaps Drew's hand.

dialogues.speaker: SNOWY MORNING.
dialogues.text: A group of monks, Drew in the lead, come running down the barefoot in the snow.

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: Throwing kicks and punches at icicles hanging from rocks Slow motion as the disciples shatter the ice.

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES WORKING IN THE FIELDS.
dialogues.text: They are singing again, but this time the song is in Chin

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES WORKING ON THE UNBENDABLE
dialogues.text: Drew is in the middle, and Gao is straining to bend his r He is getting the hang of it. The D.S. walks up with another monk with    a spear. Toge position a wooden target. The monk bows    to D.S. and to the disciples, then positions the point    of the spear i his neck. He then hands the shaft of the    spear to the The D.S. holds the shaft and starts to push, bending the slowly but surely.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND THE DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: Amazed.

dialogues.speaker: THE MONK
dialogues.text: The spear is now almost bent double. With a flick of his head, the spear goes flying into the positioned behind him, its point finding the bulls-eye. Drew walks over to the target and sees that the very real is imbedded deep into the wood of the target. DREW (bowing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy, his spirit is strong...

dialogues.speaker: AMERICAN FOOTBALL SPINNING THROUGH THE AIR.
dialogues.text: Set against a deep blue sky, it could be spinning anywher CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL the Shaolin Temple "forest of where the disciples are having a pick up football game В­ the disciples' afternoon off. The football spins into the Gao, who drops it. Drew runs over, showing Gao how to catch the ball, and ho the cuts he has to make (no dialogue, music over). Gao follows Drew's instructions, then they run the play. Gao is all alone and he catches the ball easily for a tou Drew runs up and high-fives Gao, then teaches him how to ball. They are playing some more, having a great time. This tim out for a pass, with Gao playing defense. Li throws the p intercepts. Drew, laughing, goes after Gao.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who goes long for a pass, which Gao lets fly. It is immediately obvious that it is way too long.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Who is walking along through the stupa, meditating as he

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who stops running and sees san de. the ball is going towa

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: The ball is heading right for his HEAD!

dialogues.speaker: DREW, GAO AND OTHERS
dialogues.text: They are bracing for the impact, and the trouble it will

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Who at the last moment turns and catches the ball like a receiver. He holds the ball and looks right at Drew, a ve look on his face.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Expecting the worst.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: His stern face now taking on a mischevious look. He hefts and puts his fingers on the laces. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go long. Drew pauses for a moment, not sure    what San De said, u motions with his left hand, like a    NFL quarterback, fo out. He takes off sprinting, with    Gao covering him lik San De throws the ball to him in a    perfect spiral, to Gao has no play on the throw, and    Drew catches it in s San De immediately returns to his meditation, while Drew others stand around dumbstruck.

dialogues.speaker: COUNTRYSIDE.
dialogues.text: They come to a stream, and there by a stream is a beautif woman who can't get across the stream without getting her soaked. Without thinking twice, Drew allows her to get on his bac carries her across the river. He deposits her on the othe then continues running. Gao and Li run up next to Drew, and together they go back temple. When they stop outside the temple, they are breat heavily. finally catching his breath, Gao turns to Drew. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe you carried that girl over the stream! After all the trouble you got into... LI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you crazy? You almost got kicked out once over that kind of thing... Drew smiles slightly. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I left that girl at the stream. Are you two still carrying her? He turns and walks away, leaving Li and Gao to puzzle tha As he walks away, San De comes out from behind a pillar w been sweeping, smiling and nodding his head at Drew's ans

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES ARE GOING AT IT.
dialogues.text: The action is fast and furious.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND GAO
dialogues.text: Who are squared    off and fighting. They are intense, an techniques they    are throwing are full power. Drew hits bends over. Drew    closes, thinking that he has Gao at h the last minute,    Gao stands up and cold cocks Drew, wh ground.

dialogues.speaker: TIGHT ON DREW
dialogues.text: Who is trying to get his bearings. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lucky shot, slant eye!

dialogues.speaker: GAO
dialogues.text: Who gives him a mean look. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stink, American!

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who stands up, mad. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it! You're dead meat! He comes at Gao, and they start fighting again, throwing acrobatic kicks and techniques. A gong sounds, O.S., and Gao and Drew stop, bow to each o then embrace, smiling. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saved by the bell... GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had you... Drew moves off to the side to get a drink of water, and t As he rubs his neck, D.S. comes up to him. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: San De wants to see you, in his chambers. Drew raises his eyebrows, then looks over at Gao and Li. his towel and snaps Gao with it as he walks by. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wonder what you did now...

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND SAN DE SITTING ACROSS FROM
dialogues.text: San De has an ornately embroidered golden box in his hand showing it to Drew. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are to deliver this scroll to the Arhat living on the Jade Mountain. This is your quest. The scroll that is in this box is more precious than life. Guard it well. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will, Master. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you deliver this, you may ask this master, the most advanced monk of the Shaolin tradition, any question you wish, and he must answer it. San De takes out a map of the area. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This map will lead you to the Jade Mountain. Let nothing deter from safeguarding the sacred scroll. You leave first thing tomorrow morning. (beat) You must return within three day... or don't bother to return at all. San De stands and bows to Drew. Drew returns the bow, tak and the box, then leaves the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: SHROUDED COURTYARD.
dialogues.text: He is off on his quest.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Walking strong. the sun is high in the sky, and the scene incredibly beautiful (Guilin?).

dialogues.speaker: AN OPEN AIR MARKET.
dialogues.text: He goes over to a drink stand, and buys a cool drink. Jus about to drink it down, it is KNOCKED from his hand. Drew turns around and see four dirty thugs and their lead who hit the glass. They are yelling at Drew in Chinese, w doesn't understand. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, boys, just let me get my glass and... Drew, not looking for trouble, bends down to pick up the the leader kicks him in the rear end, sending him pitchin ground. Drew rolls to a standing position, and the five m him. A crowd is now starting to form, eager to watch how the m this situation. The thugs come after Drew, and the leader throws a roundh hitting Drew square in the jaw. They continue to attack, tries to avoid getting hit. Drew catches a haymaker, and drops, and the thugs laugh, kick him a couple of times, a dust and dirt onto him. Drew doesn't get up. They soon tire of the sport and move on, the crowd starin pity. DREW (CONT'D) (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This humble, not fighting stuff is harder, and more painful, than it looks!

dialogues.speaker: THE THUGS
dialogues.text: Who have now spotted a man and his young son. They are bo down with goods from the store, and the thugs stop them. the things from them, and start to walk off. The father tries to fight back, but they easily beat him him into the dirt. The young boy runs forward. The leader thugs raises his hand, ready to slap the boy's face. Before he can bring his arm forward, Drew's fingers come wrist, stopping it. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I don't think so...

dialogues.speaker: THE CROWD
dialogues.text: It's getting good now. The fight    starts, and this    time Drew is unencumbere violence.    He has a cause,    and he's enjoying every m fight. It    is over quickly,    as Drew is a superb figh incredible    techniques. The    thugs limp away, leaving little boy    and his father. Drew bends down and picks up the goods, handing them back and the father. Drew stops and kneels down in front of th looking deep into his eyes. A whisper is going through the crowd: "Shaolin". Drew touches the boy's cheek, smiles, then stands up and moves on, the crowd watching him walk away.

dialogues.speaker: HOLD ON BOY'S FACE
dialogues.text: He now has a hero.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he climbs the side of a mountain.

dialogues.speaker: DREW, MEDITATING NEXT TO HIS SMALL F
dialogues.text: It is dark around him, with vague forms of the temple col statues. Drew is sitting with his eyes closed, oblivious surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: DREW WORKING OUT NEXT TO A MOUNTAIN
dialogues.text: He is throwing kicks and going through his routines, conc his breathing. As he finishes a particularly strenuous se strips off his clothes and dives into the lake. As Drew's head breaks the surface of the lake, he is surp a beautiful woman standing next to where he left his clot Drew starts to get out of the lake, then remembers that h he stops, not quite knowing what to do. He goes as close as he can without coming out of the water. The woman just smiles, and starts to strip off what cloth on. She is very sexy. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, don't do that! WOMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why not? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a monk. I've taken a vow to abstain... WOMAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one will know... DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll know! Throw me my clothes, please. Pouting, the woman takes Drew's pants and tosses them to they land (purposely) about 5 feet away from the lake edg DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice throw...

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who realizes he is going to have to get out of the water cover. He gets up and hurries to where his pants are. He put them on, and the woman is all over him, trying to sed He takes her hands in his and forces her to look him in t DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Despite the fact that this is every teenage boy's dream come true, I can't! He lowers her hands, and her head drops, pouting. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Besides, if I were to break my vows, it would not be with you. He kisses her on the forehead, and then grabs the rest of clothes, running up the path away from the lake.

dialogues.speaker: VERY ORNATE TEMPLE.
dialogues.text: Drew walks up to the front of the temple, looks around fo then takes a drink of water from the well out front. Just as he starts to drink, a huge TOUR BUS pulls up in f brakes HISSING. Before he can react, the doors open and a AMERICAN TOURISTS pile out of the bus and rush into the t jostling Drew from side to side. TOURIST 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not another temple! TOURIST 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do they have a gift shop? TOURIST 3

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guide! How do you say 'gift shop'? GUIDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have 10 minutes to be back on the bus. The wave of tourists passes Drew, and he stands there loo them. Then, as a group, they realize that they just passe and turn back to Drew. TOURIST 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A real live monk! Somebody, take my picture! The tourist runs up to where Drew is and stands next to h cameras click and whirr, and Drew is thoroughly embarrass first pictures are over, and someone else wants to stand he raises his hands up to his face and bows. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Mi Two Fwo He then turns and walks away. GUIDE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monks don't like to be bothered, they are from a different world. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll say...

dialogues.speaker: THUNDERING WATERFALL.
dialogues.text: Drew stands at the side of the waterfall, studying his ma expression, we know that he has to go through the waterfa where he is going. Drew pockets the map, checks that the box is safely in pl starts toward the waterfall. The drop off the side of the is incedible В­ steep and deadly.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he enters the waterfall. The water hits his back, almo him into the abyss. Drew concentrates and moves forward, surely. He emerges on the other side, only to be confronted by a Jutting out of the swamp are rocks and tree stumps. Drew examines the distance between the objects, realizing jump from place to place and make it across. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just like at the temple... He starts out, jumping onto the first stone, then moving others. He almost falls a couple of times, but regains hi He gets a rythm going, and is soon almost halfway across. He gets to one particular rock, only to find out that it' of an alligator! Its mouth opens to bite him! Drew jumps off it quickly, onto a tree stump. When he lan stump, he examines it carefully to make sure it isn't som He continues across, more careful this time.

dialogues.speaker: DREW CLIMBING UP THE SIDE OF THE MOU
dialogues.text: It is much steeper now, and the going is much tougher.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he comes up onto a rope bridge over a deep gorge, the arhat. Drew smiles, stashes the map and starts across the bridge, hand over hand. He looks down once, at the DROP, himself to look straight ahead. He just starts across when the rope bends and jumps. Drew around to see a man RIGHT BEHIND HIM. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is this rope strong enough for both of us? No answer from the man, who is now pushing Drew to go fas inching up closer to him, and occassionally kicking him t quicker. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OK, OK, I'm going!

dialogues.speaker: THE ROPE BEHIND THEM
dialogues.text: Which is starting to fray from the weight.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who sees that and is hurrying. The rope is fraying more, and when Drew is almost there, snaps and they both go swinging into the side of the moun

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who slams into the wall hard. when he hits, the scroll PO his pocket and goes up in the air. Drew, groggy from the impact, manages to lash out and PIN to the cliff wall with the BACK of his hand.

dialogues.speaker: MAN
dialogues.text: Who is barely hanging on, just below Drew. He has his hand out to Drew for help.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who doesn't know what to do. If he tries to save the scro might fall. If he goes for the man, the box will certainl

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN
dialogues.text: Screaming for help. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on... Drew hears the headmaster's voice. SAN DE (O.S.)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scroll that is in this box is more precious than life. Guard it well. He looks down at the man, who is about to lose it. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the heck... Drew reaches down for the man's hand, letting the box fal Their hands meet, and Drew pulls him up.

dialogues.speaker: BOX
dialogues.text: As it spins down into the abyss.

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND MAN
dialogues.text: As Drew pulls him up onto his back, and carries him up th the other side of the gorge.

dialogues.speaker: DREW EATING WITH THE MAN HE SAVED.
dialogues.text: They look at each other and smile, but Drew is anything b DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What am I going to tell the arhat?

dialogues.speaker: DREW WALKING UP THE PATH TO THE ARHA
dialogues.text: There is no bounce to his step, and he is dreading this a

dialogues.speaker: ARHAT HUT.
dialogues.text: Drew walks up to the entrance, looks around. He doesn't s He walks into the hut.

dialogues.speaker: AROUND.
dialogues.text: He walks through the rooms, looking at all the books and littered around the room. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he won't miss one little scroll... He shakes his head and starts for the front door.

dialogues.speaker: HUT, HIGH UP ON THE MOUNTAIN.
dialogues.text: The view is incredible. Drew stands looking at the view, becomes aware of a figure sitting on the ground near him. He looks down, and it is the ARHAT! DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master! I apologize, I did not see you. The Arhat says nothing, but just puts out his hand for th Drew bows again, and gets down on his knees. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I failed, Master. A person was in danger... The Arhat holds up his hand, and Drew stops talking. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course, you're right. No excuses... Drew bows once more and is ready to leave. The Arhat reac robes and pulls out the embroidered box that Drew was giv temple. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have it? How? The Arhat holds up the box in front of Drew for a moment, it in two with his hands, scattering the pieces to the wi DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, I didn't fail, huh? (beat) I can ask my question, then? The Arhat sits without moving or speaking. Drew takes tha DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is the meaning of life? The Arhat ponders that for a moment, then smiles and puts on his head and stands up. ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is life? What is reality? The head of a dead cat. He walks off, leaving Drew sitting there, dumbstruck by t DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling ruefully) I just climbed a mountain to ask a loon about the meaning of life. He shakes his head and gets up, following the Arhat. The standing on the other side of his hut, the sandles still ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For forty years, Shaolin disciples have made their quest to deliver a scroll to me. You are not Chinese. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. American. ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I notice the littlest details. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many succeeded? ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A handful. You chose correctly. Nothing is more precious than human life. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, I didn't obey. ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling slightly) At the beginning of your training, you were to obey without question. Now, as you become a Shaolin, you must learn to question everything, and obey yourself. Drew and the monk bow to each other, the sunset over the the b.g.

dialogues.speaker: UP.
dialogues.text: The Arhat is already out there, moving through his gong f DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to leave. What is the easiest way to get back to the temple. ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bus. Drew laughs at the crazy reply and starts for the mountai brought him to the hut. The Arhat runs after him, grabs h and pulls him over to a place behind his hut.

dialogues.speaker: A ROAD BEHIND THE ARHAT'S HUT
dialogues.text: A road! After all he went through to get there? ARHAT (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bus stops every 20 min., will take you straight to the temple. Drew smiles and shakes his head, then bows to the Arhat. The Arhat returns the bow. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Master. ARHAT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They should give you a bus schedule with that map... He walks off to the hut, while Drew makes his way down to stop.

dialogues.speaker: DREW WALKING BACK INTO THE TEMPLE.
dialogues.text: He is dirty, weary but triumphant. As he walks back throu temple to San De's chambers to report, he sees a group of walking out the other way. The group is made up of the thugs who attacked him, the w lake, and the man from the bridge. They are talking toget way out.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Smiling as he realizes that it was all a test В­ every mo

dialogues.speaker: DREW AND THE DISCIPLES TRAINING.
dialogues.text: They are expert fighters now, and they move through the c routines with ease.

dialogues.speaker: DREW FLYING THROUGH THE AIR
dialogues.text: Hitting the ground and rolling, then coming up and throwi shuriken at a target. The throwing star hits the target dead center.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Manipulating the spear like a master.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Up on the poles again. Only this time, squared off agains They move from pole to pole, throwing kicks and punches a other.

dialogues.speaker: SWELTERING SUMMER SUN IN FRONT OF A RUN DOWN FARM BUILDIN
dialogues.text: The D.S. is standing in front of them. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to rebuild this? D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tear it down. Smiles grow on the faces of the disciples. They rush into building.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Different shots of the monks tearing the building apart w and punches. Shots of Drew, Gao and Li kicking through wa doors, through windows, etc. Some the three of them destr others are seperate. Several shots of disciples as they c on particularly difficult things, using their chi, smashi bricks and wood apart. They are destroying the building, having a GREAT TIME! (NOTE: Great place for HOT song over this scene)

dialogues.speaker: DREW'S ARM
dialogues.text: PULL BACK TO REVEAL Drew standing there, calmly, while tw disciples hang off his arm.

dialogues.speaker: TEMPLE.
dialogues.text: He is going nowhere in particular, just walking and think Suddenly, out of nowhere, comes the staff and the ATTACK. Drew calmly avoids the first few strikes, blocks a couple grabs the staff and PULLS. Out comes the D.S. into the night on the other end of the looks proudly at Drew. ANGLE ON D.S. As he smiles and bows in respect to Drew. Drew returns his bow.

dialogues.speaker: WHITE PAPER.
dialogues.text: The CAMERA follows the sweeping brush, as it ends with a The CAMERA PULLS BACK TO REVEAL the temple courtyard, whe and the D.S. are standing in front of the group of discip SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only one trial remains before you become full fledged fighting monks. The Wooden Man Chamber.

dialogues.speaker: THE DISCIPLES
dialogues.text: They are remembering the stories they have heard about th SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I warn you all, any monk who fails must leave the temple forever, and will NEVER be called Shaolin. San De pauses, letting this remark sink in. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Disciple Drew Carson, as you will return to America, and never intended to live as a monk in the temple, you need not enter the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who rises to the challenge. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master San De, I am part of the disciple class, am I not? San De nods. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I must pass this final test. Furthermore, I request that I be the first one through. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (very proud) Your request is granted.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: In front of the entrance to the Wooden Man Chamber. San D are flanking Drew as he pauses in front of the door. Drew look at San De, and the D.S. smacks Drew in the back of t DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do that for? D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My last chance В­ when you come out the other side, we will be equals. Drew smiles at the D.S.'s attempt to lighten him up. He t at the others from his disciple class, then opens the doo through.

dialogues.speaker: WOODEN MAN CHAMBER.
dialogues.text: Drew pauses for a moment,      examining the room. It is wooden statues of monks,      all in different fighting p carvings are precise and      incredibly beautiful. Their hands, fists and legs are      fashioned out of hard wood very dangerous indeed. Drew gathers himself for a moment, then starts into the c

dialogues.speaker: DREW'S FOOT
dialogues.text: As it presses down on one of the stones of the floor. The attacks start В­ from all sides, as the wooden statue LIFE, spinning, lunging and striking. Drew is caught off guard, and is hit several times, drive the door of the chamber. The statues stop moving. Drew, a little scared, tries to remember the sequence of letting his arms practice for the attacks. There is fear in his eyes. He starts in again, and the attacks come again, but they different this time. Drew is clobbered. Driven back to the door, Drew slumps against the wall. Hi already bruised and bleeding. DREW (whispering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't do it. FLASHBACK TO D.S. D.S.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no can't, only won't.

dialogues.speaker: FLASHBACK TO SEVERAL D.S. ATTACKS
dialogues.text: Including the one where Drew succeeded in evading them.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who gathers himself, straightens up and takes a deep brea it out in a breathing exercise. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am a Shaolin monk. He enters the chamber again, and the attacks start again. Drew, however, is prepared (both mentally and physically) He blocks, avoids, rolls, jumps and redirects the attacks making his way across. He is about halfway across when an especially fierce and comes crashing towards him. Drew, caught a little off gua adjusts and manages to jump and spin out of the way. Suddenly, as he turns and tries to get his breath, two hu spears are streaking towards him. Drew blocks the SPEARS arms, misdirecting them into the wall behind him. They THWOCK into the wall, sticking there. As he rounds a particularly difficult series of statues, ARROWS comes HURTLING towards him. Drew blocks some, avoi and catches one in each hand. He throws them down and con He goes past the few remaining statues, and is out of the Chamber. All that is left is to walk down a little hallwa the door. Drew looks behind him, then starts to walk. He goes cauti expecting a trap or a trick. Nothing happens. He gets to the door and looks for a handle on the door. H handhold near the top of the door, and pulls it with his Immediately, his hands is locked in and a panel in the ce right onto his arm, forcing it down. Drew fights back wit muscles, the veins popping out in his arms and neck. Behind him, a statue has started coming towards him, spin dervish. Its fists and legs are extended, and they are de The panel drops lower and lower.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: As he relaxes his face, and forcibly relaxes his arm and letting his inner energy take over.

dialogues.speaker: PANEL
dialogues.text: As it slows with a GRINDING NOISE, then stops.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Holding up the heavy stone panel with his arm, his face a completely relaxed. The panel goes back up into the ceiling, and the door ope The whirling statue slows, and then stops altogether. Dre with a hook kick and taps it in the face. DREW (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not this time. Drew quickly walks through the door.

dialogues.speaker: JOINING THE OTHERS AS FULL-FLEDGED FIGHTING MONKS.
dialogues.text: Drew is there each time to embrace them and congratulate

dialogues.speaker: DISCIPLES.
dialogues.text: There are a few missing from their ranks, monks who did n through the chamber, but the majority of them are there. temple is gathered to watch the ceremony. San De and D.S. are dressed in elaborate ceremonial robes After he goes through some complicated ceremonial movemen including the waving of smoking incense over them, San De hands SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are now Shaolin. We welcome you into our ranks as fighting monks... A roar rises from the assembled monks, and fireworks go o around.

dialogues.speaker: REAR OF COURTYARD
dialogues.text: Where a huge red sheet is pulled back to reveal tables la Chinese dishes, wine and other foods. The party gets going and is soon in full gear.

dialogues.speaker: DREW, GAO AND LI
dialogues.text: As they congratulate themselves, and gorge themselves on tables of Chinese food.

dialogues.speaker: THE ENTIRE GROUP
dialogues.text: They are enjoying themselves. This only happens once every couple of years, and the mon intent on enjoying themselves.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE, (DREW'S POV)
dialogues.text: Who is walking towards the side of the temple, away from

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who sees him leave. He excuses himself from his group.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Who is walking in the bamboo grove, his hands behind him. up to him and they bow. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Congratulations. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't have made it through without you. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You once asked why I came here, why did you let me in? SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you remember the story you heard about the monk who would not leave? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That monk was me.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who digests this. He smiles a little. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would like to ask a favor. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before you leave for American, can you help at an international tournament in Beijing? The Shaolin temple has an entry, and he will be fighting men from all over the world В­ I'd like you to be there. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem. (he smiles) Without pause. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, a friend would like to see you. (beat) ... alone. From out of the bamboo grove comes Ashema, her hands in f and her head down. She is not sure Drew wants to see her.
