Drew looks at her, then back to San De, but he is already are alone. Drew walks to her, takes her chin in his hand and tilts i at her face. Her eyes are full of love and tenderness, an fear. Drew kisses that fear away.

dialogues.speaker: RINGS.
dialogues.text: One large raised ring is in the middle of the floor В­ th the finals.

dialogues.speaker: SIDE OF THE RING
dialogues.text: Where Li, Gao, San De, D.S. and some others are waiting. in monastic garb. Drew and Ashema walk up to them, holding hands. Drew is d fighting monk's costume as well, and he bows to his fello DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we late? SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fight has not yet started. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you think he would get into the finals? SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who could know? He fights the winner of the Western countries, which is why I wanted you here. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll help any way I can.

dialogues.speaker: THE CROWD
dialogues.text: As it parts to let someone through. Drew turns casually t the competitor. Slowly, a figure, followed by a large gro people, comes clear... it is Trevor!

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Could he have known?

dialogues.speaker: TREVOR
dialogues.text: Who spots drew standing near the ring. He walks past him, place his face. Then, he comes back and walks right up to slaps him on the back. TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson! Drew Carson! I can't believe it! I come half way around the world, and run into you! I heard you left the city, but I didn't know losing to me drove you into being a monk! Drew is dumbstruck, and Trevor takes advantage of it. TREVOR (CONT'D) (to San De)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He take a vow of silence too? Nice hair, Drew. (he looks at Ashema)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he took a vow of chastity too, honey, you see me after this fight, 'Kay? He puts his arm around Ashema and lets his hand slide dow rear end. TREVOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wish me luck, huh? He walks off, and Drew, who still hasn't said a word, sta him. All of the monks are looking at Drew with questionin everyone that is except for San De.

dialogues.speaker: THE RING
dialogues.text: As Trevor and the Shaolin entry bow to each other. The fi It isn't even close. Trevor is better than he ever was. H incredible, and he destroys the Shaolin fighter. Oblivious to the boos and whistles from the crowd, he pla Shaolin fighter, making him look like a real fool.

dialogues.speaker: REACTION SHOTS OF DREW
dialogues.text: Who is watching the destruction. Behind his eyes, he is r humiliation.

dialogues.speaker: TREVOR
dialogues.text: Who finishes the shaolin fighter off with a devestating t and then immediately plays to the crowd, RIGHT IN FRONT O THE OTHERS. The referee comes over to Trevor, and raises his fist up Trevor tears his arm away and SCREAMS TO THE CROWD: TREVOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: I'M NOT DONE
dialogues.text: The crowd, which before was wild and booing, now grows qu TREVOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want HIM! He points right at Drew. TREVOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to face the American who is now a Shaolin monk! I want to learn at the hands of a master! The crowd, who has seen Drew and heard about him for quit warms to the prospect. They start cheering for the Americ to face Trevor. TREVOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want the American Shaolin!

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who doesn't know what to do. San De appears and puts a co hand on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: TREVOR
dialogues.text: Pointing and yelling for Drew.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who climbs the ropes and goes into the ring. The crowd is crazy, eager to see the match. Drew, oblivious to the cro over to Trevor. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I came to the Shaolin Temple because of you, Trevor. You humiliated me, and I wanted to make sure it could never happen again. TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, let's see what you've learned. DREW (shaking his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've learned that... there's nothing to prove. Beating you is no longer important. It was my ego that had to be defeated, not you. TREVOR (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bull! You're just chicken! DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The arts should never be about who is best В­ they are to important for that. He bows to Trevor and starts out of the ring.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: They don't know what's going on.

dialogues.speaker: LI, GAO AND OTHERS
dialogues.text: They don't know either. They want Drew to fight him. ANGLE ON SAN DE AND D.S. Who know what is happening and are proud of Drew, prouder have ever been. TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: COME BACK HERE! You can't just walk away! Drew steps out of the ring and walks over to where San De standing. They bow, and the pride is shining in San De's SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you turn away from him out of fear?

dialogues.speaker: TREVOR
dialogues.text: Who is seething. TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought the Shaolin monks were warriors, not babies! Look at him В­ he is too scared to face me!

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: His face calm. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, master. I will not fight for personal glory, or for my ego. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have learned much.

dialogues.speaker: TREVOR
dialogues.text: TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shaolin monks are PUSSIES! Warrior-monks? Ha!

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Who indicates trevor with a inclination of his head. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did the right thing.

dialogues.speaker: TREVOR
dialogues.text: TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about you, baldy? Or you? He is pointing at Li and Gao and the others, who are itch into the ring. Gao goes over to San De, and shoots a ques at Drew. GAO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master, the American is insulting the Temple, and the fighting monks. SAN DE (looking at drew)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What should be done? GAO (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone should face him in combat. For the tradition of the temple. San De looks at Drew long and hard. SAN DE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are some times when a Shaolin must fight, and some people who will not learn until they are taught a lesson.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who understands the implication of what he is saying. He smile slowly. SAN DE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's your call. Drew nods, then turns to face the ring, where Trevor is s standing, trying to get someone to fight him. Drew walks with Gao back to the side of the ring. He turn Li and together they high-five. DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the temple... Drew climbs into the ring. The crowd is going crazy. Trevor has a predator's grin on he sits down in his corner to get ready to start the matc Immediately, his contingent of people start to work on hi drinks, etc.

dialogues.speaker: DREW
dialogues.text: Who sits alone in the other corner.

dialogues.speaker: LI AND GAO
dialogues.text: Who see the difference. Immediately, they mobilize the ot

dialogues.speaker: GAO
dialogues.text: Who pulls a drink from one of the men in the crowd, and r give it to Drew.

dialogues.speaker: DREW'S CORNER
dialogues.text: As it is flooded with monks. Some of them are massaging D (painfully), others are stretching his legs out, others w to bring air to him, etc. The referee signals for the fighters to come to the cente and he motions for them to bow to each other. TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember last time, punk? DREW

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing exists but the moment, and... (beat) ... I'm going to enjoy it. They back up, and the fight begins. Trevor attacks hard, but Drew avoids easily, using all so He continues to attack, throwing flashy technique after f technique, but he can't touch Drew. TREVOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay still, dammit! Stand and fight! And he dances out of the way. Trevor is getting more and Soon, Drew tires of this game and decides to end this goes after Trevor, and it is immediately obvious that completely outclassed. Drew scores on Trevor at will, Trevor totally confused and helpless with a mixture of takedowns, flips and punches. Trevor drops to one knee, his hands down at his side, not bothering to defend himself. Drew grabs Trevor by the front of his uniform and pulls b right hand in a fist. He is going to put him out with a g fashioned roundhouse punch.

dialogues.speaker: LI AND GAO
dialogues.text: Yelling for the knock out blow.

dialogues.speaker: D.S. AND SAN DE
dialogues.text: Worried about this latest development. Instead, however, Drew smiles and lifts Trevor up and sha hand, putting an arm around him to steady him in front of Trevor looks into Drew's face, wondering why Drew would d thing. When he sees Drew's friendly face, he knows. To teach him a lesson. Trevor smiles and holds up Drew's hand as the champion. The crowd goes crazy.

dialogues.speaker: LI AND GAO
dialogues.text: Who also get the message. ANGLE ON SAN DE AND D.S. Who knew the message all along.

dialogues.speaker: ENTIRE RING
dialogues.text: Drew and Trevor standing together in the center. The monk side climb into the ring to celebrate with Drew.

dialogues.speaker: HIS SHOULDER.
dialogues.text: He is doing the beginning of a Shaolin form. When he fini salute, a figure comes toward him. It is San De, and he has something in his hands. Drew bows to San De, and San De holds THE GOLDEN SASH out Drew takes it and San De bows to him. Drew can't stand it and rushes up to San De. He gives him a hug.

dialogues.speaker: SAN DE
dialogues.text: Who is not used to shows of affection. He is lost for a m his face softens and he returns Drew's embrace. They break and bow again, and San De moves off. Drew stan holding the Golden Sash, the rising sun of the first day of his life shining in the b.g.

dialogues.speaker: ASHEMA
dialogues.text: Who comes up to Drew, taking his arm and walks with him a Great Wall.
